summary: A debt-ridden young man attempts suicide, but is rescued only to find that his luck is finally turning.
cast: Kareena Kapoor|Shahid Kapoor|Paresh Rawal|Neha Dhupia|Rajpal Yadav|Sunil Shetty|Om Puri|Asrani|Anupam Kher|Manoj Joshi|Shakti Kapoor|Sushma Reddy|Amita Nangia|Priyanshi|Jaya Murali|Paresh Bramhbhatt|Dileep
director: Directors: Priyadarshan, Kookie Gulati (as Kookie V. Gulati)
title: Chup Chup Ke
